Class summary: DuplexTaggerModel: A transformer‑based duplex tagging system that learns to assign normalization tags to tokens for both text‑to‑spoken (TN) and spoken‑to‑text (ITN) conversions. It handles data preparation, model forward passes, inference, post‑processing of tag predictions, and integrates with training, validation, and testing workflows.

We need to produce summary: overall module responsibility: provides a model class for duplex text normalization tagging using transformer token classification, supporting both directions, integrating with NeMo training pipeline.

Business intent: "Facilitates automatic text normalization in speech systems, enabling high‑quality text‑to‑speech generation and robust speech‑to‑text transcription by learning bidirectional normalization tags."
